overview: Starlet Jessie Andrews comes on to her rehab counselor Nicky Hunter. Jessie advises pal Chastity Lynn on how to bed Chastity's acting coach Magdalene St. Michaels. Meanwhile, bad girl Ash Hollywood sets her sights on parole officer Nina Hartley as Teal Conrad reveals her crush on her dad's girlfriend Julia Ann.
title: Mother Lovers Society 9
